title: The Last of Her Kind
description: Alone on post-apocalyptic Earth, young Charly Willow struggles to survive nuclear winter and find her family, until her chance meeting with a dying stranger. His last request propels her forward with a mystery she must solve, and leads to a life altering journeyâ€¦one that places the ultimate fate of the entire planet in her hands. This book is suitable for ages 16 - Adult.
author: JoAnn Rackear Goldrich
